actions.name: CreateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amplify App

actions.name: CreateBackendEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new backend environment for an Amplify App

actions.name: CreateBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Branch for an Amplify App

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

actions.name: CreateDomainAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DomainAssociation on an App

actions.name: CreateWebHook
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new webhook on an App

actions.name: DeleteApp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Amplify App by appId

actions.name: DeleteBackendEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a branch for an Amplify App

actions.name: DeleteBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a branch for an Amplify App

actions.name: DeleteDomainAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DomainAssociation

actions.name: DeleteJob
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a job, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App

actions.name: DeleteWebHook
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a webhook by id

actions.name: GenerateAccessLogs
actions.description: Grants permission to generate website access logs for a specific time range via a pre-signed URL

actions.name: GetApp
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing Amplify App by appId

actions.name: GetArtifactUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve artifact info that corresponds to a artifactId

actions.name: GetBackendEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a backend environment for an Amplify App

actions.name: GetBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a branch for an Amplify App

actions.name: GetDomainAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve domain info that corresponds to an appId and domainName

actions.name: GetJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get a job for a branch, part of an Amplify App

actions.name: GetWebHook
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve webhook info that corresponds to a webhookId

actions.name: ListApps
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing Amplify Apps

actions.name: ListArtifacts
actions.description: Grants permission to list artifacts with an app, a branch, a job and an artifact type

actions.name: ListBackendEnvironments
actions.description: Grants permission to list backend environments for an Amplify App

actions.name: ListBranches
actions.description: Grants permission to list branches for an Amplify App

actions.name: ListDomainAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to list domains with an app

actions.name: ListJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list Jobs for a branch, part of an Amplify App

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Amplify Console resource

actions.name: ListWebHooks
actions.description: Grants permission to list webhooks on an App

actions.name: StartDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to start a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

actions.name: StartJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start a new job for a branch, part of an Amplify App

actions.name: StopJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a job that is in progress, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Amplify Console resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an AWS Amplify Console resource

actions.name: UpdateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amplify App

actions.name: UpdateBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to update a branch for an Amplify App

actions.name: UpdateDomainAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update a DomainAssociation on an App

actions.name: UpdateWebHook
actions.description: Grants permission to update a webhook
